reviewText:
This video does an excellent job introducing the student to the art of sword and the various techniques involved in sword fighting.  The subject matter is very detailed and their use of foam swords provides a safe way to fully implement the many aspects of authentic sword.

This is must have for anyone with a passion to learn true sword skills.

I've done some LARPing stuff for years, but since I'd been practicing using the techniques on the DVD my game has improved, I'm in better shape than I've been in years, and I'm never wanting for sparring partners, as I can practice safely with people of any age. The website has a variety of other swords available too, so if a longsword isn't your style you can try other combos- check out the medieval two-handed longswords they offer, they're a blast.
